Attractions: Old City (Icherisheher), Maiden Tower, Shirvanshahs' Palace, Flame Towers, Heydar Aliyev Center, Fountain Square, Little Venice, Carpet Museum.
Activities: Exploring architectural contrasts, historical tours in the Old City, strolling in Fountain Square.
Cuisine: Plov (rice dish with meat), Azerbaijani kebab, Dushbara (dumpling soup).
Green Spaces: Highland Park, Baku Boulevard, Central Park.

Attractions: Nizami Ganjavi district, historical mosques, shrines, beautiful gardens.
Activities: Visiting cultural and historical sites, exploring architectural landmarks.
Green Spaces: Khan Baghi (Khan's Garden), Heydar Aliyev Park.

Attractions: Sheki Khans' Palace, local handicraft market, theater (for traditional music and dance).
Activities: Immersing in rural life, visiting Sheki market to buy carpets.
Green Spaces: Palace of the Khan's gardens, Sheki National Forests.

Attractions: Kalyan Minaret, Ark Fortress, Samanid Mausoleum, Covered Bazaars (for crafts and carpets), ancient madrasas, Samanid Mausoleum, Bolo Hauz Mosque.
Activities: Discovering ancient Islamic architecture, strolling through taki bazaars.

Attractions: Independence Square, Tashkent Metro (decorated with mosaic panels), Chorsu traditional market, National Museum of History of Uzbekistan, 'Alisher Navoi' Park.
Activities: Visiting museums and spacious parks, shopping at Chorsu Market.
Green Spaces: Alisher Navoi National Park, Japanese Garden, Tashkent Botanical Garden.

Attractions: Old city walls, palaces and fortresses, towers (for observation), ancient markets.
Activities: Exploring palaces and fortresses, viewing oases, visiting ancient markets.
Green Spaces: Ichan-Qala inner park, Khiva Culture and Recreation Park.

Attractions: Ak-Saray Palace (birthplace of Timur), historical gardens, beautiful mosaics.
Activities: Visiting historical gardens, viewing Timurid architecture.
Green Spaces: Timur Square gardens, Kitab Geological Reserve.

Attractions: (A major city with historical monuments and landmarks).
Activities: Exploring minarets and madrasas, visiting the flower garden.
Cuisine: Namangan Plov, shashlik, Fergana Valley fruits.
